General.Name: Wuzhou Special Paper Group Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Wuzhou Special Paper Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells special paper in China. It provides food wrapping, glassine, tracing, heat transfer printing, and special culture paper products. The company was formerly known as Quzhou Wuzhou Special Paper Co., Ltd. Wuzhou Special Paper Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Quzhou, China.
